about_the_game:
One of the Outer House launches a series of attacks against an Inner House on the 3rd of the 714th galactic year. This is not open warfare, but a covert backstabbing attack to be carried out under cover, because of a past family scandal.
The League is hired as the "puppet master of fate". You must sabotage the mines in the hyperspace-bubbles of the targeted house, and the processing facilities outside it, to embarrass them in the eyes of the Emperor. Other agents of the League are also in action elsewhere.
Our clan is well suited for this task, as we are the "Worm Dwellers" of the despised mutant caste who can handle the harshness of hyperspace as opposed to the "Softy" ones.

The mission pays well and we have a close relationship with the League. Their agents activated a virus in the targeted system, which disrupted the drones' functions and their AI will be unable to make comprehensive controls and interpretations. If you are as effective as possible in combat, the Corps will prioritize your ship's upgrades!
Your job is to cause chaos in this bubble colony...

THE HYPERSPACE IS US!

The goal of this shooting game is to reach the endpoint of the map.
The demo version contains
  • an exciting mission
  • 3 kinds of weapons
  • various environment
  • destructible buildings
  • full 3D VR simulation of the flight


Good luck soldier!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR: Valve Index, WMR, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Oculus Link
  • Additional Notes: Lower end systems may work. Try at your own risk. Play seated in VR.
